comment: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on nonnegative integers. The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step. Raph Levien remarks: "This seems a bit painful. I wonder if an explicit substitution version would be easier." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Apr-2004.)
